summary: In 1901, a group of IRA members decides to rob the Bank of England in order to finance their movement and to embarrass the British government.
cast: Aldo Ray|Elizabeth Sellars|Peter O'Toole|Kieron Moore|Albert Sharpe|Joseph Tomelty|Wolf Frees|John Le Mesurier|Miles Malleson|Colin Gordon|Andrew Keir|Hugh Griffith|Geoffrey Bayldon|Michael Brennan|Erik Chitty|Michael Golden|Charles Lloyd Pack|Arthur Lowe|Arthur Mullard|Peter Myers|Frederick Piper|Anita Sharp-Bolster|Russell Waters
title: El robo al banco de Inglaterra
